parts.text: {"word":"subtrahere","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(ラテン語)引き抜く、取り去る、減じる、奪う、差し引く、除く、削除する、隠す、避ける","english_definition":"(Latin) to draw away, take away, withdraw, remove, subtract, deduct, conceal, avoid","examples":[{"sentence":"Subtrahe calceos!","translation":"靴を脱げ！","note":"命令形"},{"sentence":"Subtrahere aliquid de summa.","translation":"合計から何かを差し引く。","note":"例示"}],"collocations":["subtrahere aliquid de aliquo (～から～を差し引く)","subtrahere se (身を引く、避ける)"],"synonyms":["demere","detrahere","auferre","eximere"],"antonyms":["addere","ponere","adiungere"],"related_forms":["subtractio (名詞: 減算、引き算)","subtractus (形容詞: 引き抜かれた、取り去られた、減じられた)"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「sub-」（下に、下から）+「trahere」（引く、引っ張る）から構成される。文字通りには「下から引く」という意味合い。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"classical":"/sʊpˈtra.he.re/","ecclesiastical":"/supˈtra.e.re/","notes":"発音は古典ラテン語と教会ラテン語で異なる。"},"inflection":{"conjugation":"規則的な第3活用動詞","principal_parts":["subtrahō","subtrahere","subtrāxī","subtrāctum"],"present_active_indicative":["subtrahō","subtrahis","subtrahit","subtrahimus","subtrahitis","subtrahunt"],"imperfect_active_indicative":["subtrahēbam","subtrahēbās","subtrahēbat","subtrahēbāmus","subtrahēbātis","subtrahēbant"],"future_active_indicative":["subtraham","subtrahes","subtrahet","subtrahēmus","subtrahētis","subtrahent"],"perfect_active_indicative":["subtrāxī","subtrāxistī","subtrāxit","subtrāximus","subtrāxistis","subtrāxērunt"],"pluperfect_active_indicative":["subtrāxeram","subtrāxerās","subtrāxerat","subtrāxerāmus","subtrāxerātis","subtrāxerant"],"future_perfect_active_indicative":["subtrāxerō","subtrāxeris","subtrāxerit","subtrāxerimus","subtrāxeritis","subtrāxerint"],"present_active_subjunctive":["subtraham","subtrahās","subtrahat","subtrahāmus","subtrahātis","subtrahant"],"imperfect_active_subjunctive":["subtraherem","subtraherēs","subtraheret","subtraherēmus","subtraherētis","subtraherent"],"perfect_active_subjunctive":["subtrāxerim","subtrāxeris","subtrāxerit","subtrāxerimus","subtrāxeritis","subtrāxerint"],"pluperfect_active_subjunctive":["subtrāxissem","subtrāxissēs","subtrāxisset","subtrāxissēmus","subtrāxissētis","subtrāxissent"],"present_active_infinitive":"subtrahere","perfect_active_infinitive":"subtrāxisse","future_active_participle":"subtractūrus","present_active_participle":"subtrahens","gerund":"subtrahendī","supine":"subtrāctum"],"passive_forms_available":true},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「subtrahere」は、物理的な意味での「引き抜く、取り去る」から、抽象的な意味での「減じる、奪う、隠す」まで、幅広い意味を持つラテン語の動詞です。数学的な意味での「差し引く」も重要な用法です。再帰代名詞を伴う「subtrahere se」は、「身を引く、避ける」という意味になります。","priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"level":"大学ラテン語","frequency_notes":"古典ラテン語の文献で頻繁に見られる。","priority":"★☆☆"},"related_languages":["英語の「subtract」は、このラテン語の動詞から派生している。"],"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Milites arma subtraxerunt.","translation":"兵士たちは武器を取り去った。","type":"declarative","meaning_category":"取り去る"},{"sentence":"Philosophus curas subtrahere studet.","translation":"哲学者は心配事を減じようと努める。","type":"declarative","meaning_category":"減じる"},{"sentence":"Subtrahe duo ex quinque.","translation":"5から2を引け。","type":"imperative","meaning_category":"差し引く"},{"sentence":"Subtrahe te ex hoc periculo!","translation":"この危険から身を引け！","type":"imperative","meaning_category":"避ける"}]}
